```
    44â†’    onMounted(() => {
    45â†’      // @ts-expect-error
    46â†’      menus.value = buildMenus(router.getRoutes())
    47â†’    })
    48â†’
    49â†’    watch(
    50â†’      () => app.app.value?.version,
    51â†’      () => {
    52â†’        const version = app.app.value?.version
    53â†’        if (!version) return
    54â†’
    55â†’        if (version === 'dev' || window.injectData.PAGE_PROXY) {
    56â†’          const route = router
    57â†’            .getRoutes()
    58â†’            .find((item) => item.path === '/debug') as any
    59â†’
    60â†’          menus.value.unshift(buildMenuModel(route, false, ''))
    61â†’        }
    62â†’      },
    63â†’    )
    64â†’
    65â†’    const indexRef = ref(0)
    66â†’
    67â†’    function updateIndex(nextIndex: number) {
    68â†’      if (nextIndex === indexRef.value) {
    69â†’        indexRef.value = -1
    70â†’        return
    71â†’      }
    72â†’      indexRef.value = nextIndex
    73â†’    }
    74â†’
    75â†’    function handleRoute(item: MenuModel, nextIndex?: number) {
    76â†’      if (item.subItems?.length) {
    77â†’        return
    78â†’      }
    79â†’
    80â†’      router.push({
    81â†’        path: item.fullPath,
    82â†’        query: item.query,
    83â†’      })
    84â†’      if (typeof nextIndex === 'number') {
    85â†’        updateIndex(nextIndex)
    86â†’      }
    87â†’    }
    88â†’
    89â†’    const title = configs.title
    90â†’    const sidebarRef = ref<HTMLDivElement>()
    91â†’    const uiStore = useStoreRef(UIStore)
    92â†’    onClickOutside(sidebarRef, () => {
    93â†’      const v = uiStore.viewport
    94â†’      const isM = v.value.pad || v.value.mobile
    95â†’      if (isM) {
    96â†’        props.onCollapseChange(true)
    97â†’      }
    98â†’    })
    99â†’    const { isDark, toggleDark } = useStoreRef(UIStore)
   100â†’
   101â†’    const { onTransitionEnd, statusRef } = useSidebarStatusInjection(
   102â†’      () => props.collapse,
   103â†’    )
   104â†’
   105â†’    return () => {
   106â†’      return (
   107â†’        <div
   108â†’          class={[
   109â†’            styles.root,
   110â†’            props.collapse ? styles.collapse : null,
   111â†’            styles[statusRef.value],
   112â†’          ]}

   114â†’          ref={sidebarRef}
   115â†’        >

   117â†’            {/* Header */}

   119â†’              {/* Logo */}

   121â†’                <img src={uwu} alt={title} />

   123â†’
   124â†’              {/* Header Actions */}
   125â†’              <div class={styles['header-actions']}>
   126â†’                <button

   128â†’                  onClick={() => void toggleDark()}
   129â†’                  title={isDark.value ? 'åˆ‡æ¢äº®è‰²' : 'åˆ‡æ¢æš—è‰²'}

   135â†’                  onClick={() => props.onCollapseChange(!props.collapse)}
   136â†’                  title={props.collapse ? 'å±•å¼€' : 'æ”¶èµ·'}
   137â†’                >
   138â†’                  <PanelLeftClose
   139â†’                    size={16}
   140â†’                    class={[
   141â†’                      'transition-transform duration-200',

   143â†’                    ]}
   144â†’                  />

   148â†’
   149â†’            {/* Menu */}
   150â†’            <NLayoutContent class={styles.menu} nativeScrollbar={false}>
   151â†’              <nav class={styles.items}>
   152â†’                {menus.value.map((item, index) => {
   153â†’                  const isActive =
   154â†’                    route.value.fullPath === item.fullPath ||
   155â†’                    route.value.fullPath.startsWith(item.fullPath)
   156â†’
   157â†’                  return (
   158â†’                    <div
   159â†’                      key={item.fullPath}
   160â†’                      class={[styles.item, isActive && styles.active]}
   161â†’                      data-path={item.fullPath}
   162â†’                    >
   163â†’                      <MenuItem
   164â†’                        title={item.title}
   165â†’                        onClick={() =>
   166â†’                          item.subItems?.length
   167â†’                            ? updateIndex(index)
   168â†’                            : handleRoute(item, index)
   169â†’                        }
   170â†’                        collapse={props.collapse}
   171â†’                      >
   172â†’                        {{
   173â†’                          icon: () => item.icon,
   174â†’                        }}
   175â†’                      </MenuItem>
   176â†’
   177â†’                      {item.subItems && item.subItems.length > 0 && (
   178â†’                        <div
   179â†’                          class={[
   180â†’                            styles['has-child'],
   181â†’                            indexRef.value === index && styles.expand,
   182â†’                          ]}

   184â†’                            maxHeight:
   185â†’                              indexRef.value === index

   188â†’                          }}

   193â†’                              route.value.fullPath.startsWith(child.fullPath)

   223â†’            {/* Footer */}

   235â†’    }
   236â†’  },
   237â†’})
   238â†’
   239â†’const MenuItem = defineComponent({
   240â†’  props: {

   242â†’      type: String,
   243â†’      required: true,
   244â†’    },

   251â†’      required: true,
   252â†’    },
   253â†’  },
   254â†’
   255â†’  setup(props, { slots }) {

   263â†’    )
   264â†’  },
   265â†’})
   266â†’
   267â†’const LogoutAvatarButton = defineComponent({
   268â†’  setup() {
   269â†’    const { user } = useStoreRef(UserStore)
   270â†’    const router = useRouter()
   271â†’
   272â†’    const handleLogout = async (e: MouseEvent) => {
```

```
    12â†’import { useDark, useToggle } from '@vueuse/core'
    13â†’
    14â†’export interface ViewportRecord {
    15â†’  w: number
    16â†’  h: number
    17â†’  mobile: boolean
    18â†’  pad: boolean
    19â†’  hpad: boolean
    20â†’  wider: boolean
    21â†’  widest: boolean
    22â†’  phone: boolean
    23â†’}
    24â†’
    25â†’export const useUIStore = defineStore('ui', () => {
    26â†’  const viewport = ref<ViewportRecord>({} as any)
    27â†’  const sidebarCollapse = ref(viewport.value.mobile ? true : false)
    28â†’
    29â†’  const isDark = useDark()
    30â†’  const toggleDark = useToggle(isDark)
    31â†’
    32â†’  onMounted(() => {
    33â†’    const resizeHandler = debounce(updateViewport, 500, { trailing: true })
    34â†’    window.addEventListener('resize', resizeHandler)
    35â†’    updateViewport()
    36â†’  })
    37â†’  const updateViewport = () => {
    38â†’    const innerHeight = window.innerHeight
    39â†’    const width = document.documentElement.getBoundingClientRect().width
    40â†’    const { hpad, pad, mobile } = viewport.value
    41â†’
    42â†’    // å¿½ç•¥ç§»åŠ¨ç«¯æµè§ˆå™¨ ä¸Šä¸‹æ»šåŠ¨ å¯¼è‡´çš„è§†å›¾å¤§å°å˜åŒ–
    43â†’    if (
    44â†’      viewport.value.h &&
    45â†’      // chrome mobile delta == 56
    46â†’      Math.abs(innerHeight - viewport.value.h) < 80 &&
    47â†’      width === viewport.value.w &&
    48â†’      (hpad || pad || mobile)
    49â†’    ) {
    50â†’      return
    51â†’    }
    52â†’    viewport.value = {
    53â†’      w: width,
    54â†’      h: innerHeight,
    55â†’      mobile: window.screen.width <= 568 || window.innerWidth <= 568,
    56â†’      pad: window.innerWidth <= 768 && window.innerWidth > 568,
    57â†’      hpad: window.innerWidth <= 1024 && window.innerWidth > 768,
    58â†’      wider: window.innerWidth > 1024 && window.innerWidth < 1920,
    59â†’      widest: window.innerWidth >= 1920,
    60â†’
    61â†’      phone: window.innerWidth <= 768,
    62â†’    }
    63â†’  }
    64â†’
    65â†’  const contentWidth = computed(() => {
    66â†’    if (sidebarCollapse.value) {
    67â†’      // æŠ˜å æ—¶å†…å®¹åŒºåŸŸå æ»¡æ•´ä¸ªå±å¹•å®½åº¦
    68â†’      return viewport.value.w
    69â†’    }
    70â†’    // å±•å¼€æ—¶å‡å» Sidebar å®½åº¦
    71â†’    const sidebarWidthValue = Number.parseInt(
    72â†’      getComputedStyle(document.documentElement).getPropertyValue(
    73â†’        '--sidebar-width',
    74â†’      ),
    75â†’    )
    76â†’    return viewport.value.w - sidebarWidthValue
    77â†’  })
    78â†’
    79â†’  const contentInsetWidth = computed(
    80â†’    () =>
    81â†’      contentWidth.value -
    82â†’      Number.parseInt(getComputedStyle(document.documentElement).fontSize) * 6,
    83â†’  )
    84â†’
    85â†’  watch(
    86â†’    () => isDark.value,
    87â†’    (isDark) => {
    88â†’      if (isDark) {
    89â†’        document.documentElement.classList.add('dark')
    90â†’      } else {
    91â†’        document.documentElement.classList.remove('dark')
    92â†’      }
    93â†’    },
    94â†’  )
    95â†’
    96â†’  const naiveUIDark = ref(false)
    97â†’  return {
    98â†’    viewport,
    99â†’    contentWidth,
   100â†’    contentInsetWidth,
   101â†’    sidebarCollapse,
   102â†’
   103â†’    isDark,
   104â†’    toggleDark,
   105â†’
   106â†’    naiveUIDark,
   107â†’    onlyToggleNaiveUIDark: (dark?: boolean) => {

   110â†’  }

   112â†’
```

```
    87â†’    const footerActions = computed(
    88â†’      () => props.footerButtonElement ?? layout.footerActions.value,
    89â†’    )
    90â†’
    91â†’    const headerClassName = computed(
    92â†’      () => props.headerClass ?? layout.headerClass.value,
    93â†’    )
    94â†’
    95â†’    return () => (
    96â†’      <div class="flex h-full flex-col bg-[var(--content-bg)]">
    97â†’        {!shouldHideHeader.value && (
    98â†’          <header
    99â†’            class={[
   100â†’              'flex h-20 shrink-0 items-center justify-between px-8',
   101â†’              headerClassName.value,
   102â†’            ]}
   103â†’          >
   104â†’            <h1 class="text-xl font-semibold text-[var(--sidebar-text-active)]">
   105â†’              {pageTitle.value}
   106â†’            </h1>
   107â†’            <div class="flex items-center gap-1.5">
   108â†’              {headerActions.value ?? slots.actions?.()}
   109â†’            </div>
   110â†’          </header>
   111â†’        )}
   112â†’
   113â†’        {/* Content */}
   114â†’        <NLayoutContent
   115â†’          nativeScrollbar={false}
   116â†’          class="flex-1 !bg-transparent"
   117â†’          contentClass="px-8 pb-8"
   118â†’        >
   119â†’          {slots.default?.()}
   120â†’        </NLayoutContent>
   121â†’
   122â†’        {/* Footer Actions & Float Buttons */}
   123â†’        {(footerActions.value || layout.floatButtons.value.size > 0) && (
   124â†’          <footer class="fixed bottom-4 right-4 z-10 flex items-center gap-2">
   125â†’            {footerActions.value}
   126â†’            {Array.from(layout.floatButtons.value.values())}
   127â†’          </footer>
   128â†’        )}
   129â†’      </div>
   130â†’    )
   131â†’  },
   132â†’})
   133â†’
   134â†’// Re-export useLayout composable for convenience
   135â†’export { useLayout } from '~/hooks/use-layout'
   136â†’
```
